game.name: Pizza Mania
game.description:
This brand new cooking game is perfect for girls of all ages. Whether you are a small kid, a teen or a full grown-up checking it out to ensure you enter into the world of best girls games shortly. In this free online game for girls, you will play the role of a young pizzeria chef who works in a popular pizza restaurant of the town. So, are you ready to accept this food challenge? Join Pizza Mania and show the world that you have ultimate cooking and management skills! The character of the game has a full faith on you, so dont prove her wrong.

Start it with taking the orders from the counter and then getting yourself enrolled fast in arranging the ingredients to create the extremely delicious pizzas for your customers! You can play this online popular fast food time using your mouse to interact with the things displayed on the screen. Follow the directions as given and deliver all your orders of pizza time to make your customers happy and win your game! Earn the biggest money only by making food to the customers in the shortest possible time!

It will be amazing to attend all the customers who love to eat pizzas made by your hands. Make sure to respond to their orders quickly before another customer comes and asks for his food. Complete your order before the time runs out without making mistakes in this HTML5 game for kids! Discovering new pizza recipes will also help you to unlock new ingredients. Make to prepare your fast food fast and serve it properly to your customers. You will be lost your game if you force them to wait for too long since most of your customers are impatient. Enjoy more free cooking games here at atmegame.com!
